Experience

Rising Tide Digital Inc.

Jan 2018 - Present

Full Stack developer. I have been involved in various projects working with clients like Sunkist, Redbull, and SM. All applications we develop are supported end-to-end, from planning, development, deployment and management.

FX Systems Ltd.

May 2016 - July 2016

Java Developer. Demonstrated knowledge in web development by continously making improvements and bug fixes both in frontend and backend of the company's web application, which is written in Java and uses Spring framework.

UP ITDC

Jan 2015 - Nov 2015

PHP Developer. Developed and supported wordpress site of our client. Utilized knowledge in MVC and integrated that to the website, with the help of WP-MVC plugin to develop webpages that showcases the country's industries and uses high maps JS to highlight its regions per active industry.

Hewlett Packard

Feb 2012 - Dec 2014

Technology Consultant. Level 1 support team for various applications of P&G. I have successfully completed and resolved thousands of requests, and incidents. Became a report owner and an SME (Subject Matter Expert) of one of the largest applications guiding newcomers to solve their own tickets.

Projects

Rising Tide Digital

About

Developed the website for the company. I'm always communicating with our designer to make sure the site's look and feel is spot on.

Sunkist

About

Made a simple CMS that allows our client to exchange the images, content, and video of the site and a promotion application that accepts codes from bottles to select the winner for the day. We had around 1500 users, and 100 - 200 transactions daily as per Google analytics.

Red Bull

About

Continued the development of daemons that communicates with GSM modules which issues commands to top-up customers who won with codes from cans, and bottles. The application had around 1200 transactions daily.

About
